541810.name: Island Simulator 2016 - Mp-44
541810.description:
The Mp-44 it is very powerful gun from second world war. This weapon definitely will help you with survive in Island Simulator 2016. Always you have problem with ammunition ? this dlc are for you because you will get on start mp-44 weapon with 3 fully loaded magazines this will definitely help you with survive.

Information:

Name: Mp-44
Type: Assault rifle
Cartridge: 7.92x33mm
Rate of fire: 550–600 rounds/min
Location: unknown (in your inventory when dlc was installed)
Ammunition location: General Military, Military Tent (on start you will get 3 fully loaded magazines for mp-44)
541810.supported_languages: 英语, 波兰语, 德语, 捷克语, 俄语
